description:
"Fun, fun, fun!!! Insanely addictive is not a joke, it's a warning!" -Customer Review (5 stars) MORE REVIEWS:
"Superb gameplay. Addictive and nice graphics. Got me playing endlessly for hours. A must-have game on ur webos device" -Customer Review (5 stars)
"I really like this game! It gives me the perfect opportunity to show my friends what my Pixi CAN do!" -Customer Review (5 stars)
"I love love love this game ! It may be a simple type of game but it's so so so addicting. . Once I start to play I just have to keep trying to beat my own best score. I highly recommend this to everyone !" -Customer Review (5 stars)
"One of the best apps I've seen" -Customer Review (5 stars)

What's new in 1.3.5 update:
-fixes crash the bug in corridor level

What's new in 1.3.0 update:
-the game is now more stable 
-fixed some minor bugs


Over 30.000.000 times played since the game was released! 
Putki is a amazing reaction-based 3D-tunnel game.
Can you navigate yourself through the tunnel. 

Features : 
*simple controls (tilt your phone to rotate)
*online highscores
*trophys
*5 unique levels
*unlimited gameplay
*trophys

Visit www.alphapolygon.com and check out more great FREE games for WebOS and support the developer.

Putki is also now available for iPhone/iPad/iPod http://bit.ly/dm3jkQ
